tool_description: Our IFSC Code Search API provides instant access to Indian bank branch codes for all major banks. This API enables developers to build applications and tools to lookup IFSC codes by bank name, branch, city and state.   Our database is updated daily by the RBI to have the latest IFSC information. The API returns IFSC code, bank name, branch address and other branch details in JSON format. It offers high uptime and fast response time for seamless integration. Whether you're enabling IFSC search...
name: IFSC SERP
title: IFSC SERP

api_list.name: FIND MICR
api_list.description:
MICR stands for "Magnetic Ink Character Recognition". It's a technology that uses a 9-digit code printed at the bottom of a cheque to quickly and accurately identify and process it. 
The MICR code and cheque number are displayed in a unique font and ink, and the latter can only be picked up by a Magnetic Character Ink Reader.
